content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position not specified) and stone furnace (position not specified) for processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Inserters (positions not specified) that insert iron ore into the stone furnaces.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Ensure that you are aware of the inventory status before attempting to insert or extract items to avoid confusion about available resources.

### Errors when inserting into furnaces
- Make sure to check that the furnaces are available and not busy before inserting items into them.

### Errors when extracting from furnaces
- Ensure that you are extracting from the correct furnace and that it has enough items to extract.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move closer to the target entity from which you want to extract items before executing the extraction command.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure that the tile is free before attempting to place an entity on it.
